title: Silver team looking for adc and mid
body: We have a supp a top and a jungle we just need mid and adc jungle ranked silver 4 in pre season support rank bronze 5 but only because doesn't play ranked alot and top was gold 3 contact me on league account

replies.body:
PepperOnSalt
Mid-Top-Supp main in solo queue.
Strong talon game, can play even bad match ups. 
Decent Zyra game almost as good with Talon but know it's a strange meta for mid but she has good burst and zone CC. 
Working on perfecting Malzahar but having a hard time solo killing consistently, more often than anything it's just a farm lane till a side lane pushes for a roam to pick.
Very prominent to respect wave management.
Idk, think I have decent knowledge but always willing to learn and practice what's needed to improve.
Silver 3 atm but sometimes tank to pick of not picking to carry and picking to support.
unfortunately im not what ur looking for.. however i can be a substitute jungler and support for u guys when ur missing those two roles.. im silver 4
I play mid add me if interest.
